title: HoP 313 - Queen of the Sciences - Anna Komnene and her Circle
itunes:title: HoP 313 - Queen of the Sciences - Anna Komnene and her Circle
description: Princess Anna Komnene makes good use of her political retirement by gathering a circle of scholars to write commentaries on Aristotle.
